page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: Most people in our D-block who are over 18 own a driver's licence,hardly anyone owns a motor bike.99% of families own a car .Most people use a train for long distances only,except when they go on holiday in this country;when they use their car.The most used type of {transport} in our D-block is the car. Most adults who were asked did not own a bicycle ;they preferred walking or driving. Most of the cars in our area are Fords or British Leyland. Liverpool Road is the biggest and busiest road running through our D-block.Traffic travels from Preston and Leyland to Southport,Black pool and Liverpool.Not many people use buses except those going to town and school children.There are no taxi stands the nearest one being at the railway station in Preston.
